Layer.ResetXRotMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bouncebegin(spb*2) v:rotationx(0) end end end
Layer.IntroBGMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_bg0 then usa_bg0:bounceend(spb*.5) usa_bg0:zoom(.5) usa_bg0:bounceend(spb*.5) usa_bg0:zoom(0) end end
Layer.RevealBGMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_bgw then usa_bgw:accelerate(spb) usa_bgw:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-SCREEN_WIDTH) end end
Layer.Page11MessageCommand:
%function(self) if P1 then P1:accelerate(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) P1:skewx(1) P1:decelerate(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.5) P1:skewx(0) end if P2 then P2:accelerate(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) P2:skewx(1) P2:sleep(0) P2:skewx(0) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) P2:accelerate(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:sleep(spb) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.65) usa_modtext2:accelerate(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29)
end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:hidden(0) usa_bg1:accelerate(spb*2) usa_bg1:x(0) end if usa_bgw then usa_bgw:accelerate(spb*4) usa_bgw:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) usa_bgw:diffuse(1,1,1,1) end SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():accelerate(spb*2) SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.2) end
Layer.Page12MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.34) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*2) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.34) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*2) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.6) end end
Layer.Page13MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:settext('100% Tipsy') usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.7) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.025) usa_bg1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.75) end end
Layer.Page14MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.45) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.45) P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.9) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('75% Brake') usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.45) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.65) usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) usa_modtext1:zoomx(2) usa_modtext1:zoomy(.5) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.9) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.6) end end
Layer.Page15MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.25) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.25) usa_modtext1:zoomx(1) usa_modtext1:zoomy(1) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) usa_bg1:y(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.1) usa_bg1:zoom(2) end end
Layer.Page16MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*2.25) P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.525) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.525) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('120% Boost') usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.29) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) usa_modtext1:zoomx(1) usa_modtext1:zoomy(5) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg1:x(0) usa_bg1:y(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.35) usa_bg1:zoom(1) end end
Layer.Page17MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.34) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) usa_modtext1:zoomx(1) usa_modtext1:zoomy(1) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:settext('120% Wave') usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_WIDTH*.45) usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.34) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.6) end end
Layer.Page21MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('120% Dizzy') usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) usa_modtext2:zoomy(1) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:linear(spb) usa_bg1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.2) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:hidden(0) usa_bg2:linear(spb) usa_bg2:x(0) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) end end
Layer.Page22MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb*2) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) P2:linear(spb) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.45) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb*2) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:settext('300% Bumpy') usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.65) usa_modtext2:diffuse(1,1,1,1) end if usa_bg1 then usa_bg1:hidden(1) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.65) end end
Layer.Page23MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) P1:y(0) P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.4) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.5) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('25% Tornado') usa_modtext1:rotationz(0) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) usa_modtext1:y(0) usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.4) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.5) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1) usa_modtext2:diffuse(0,0,0,1) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) usa_bg2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.9) usa_bg2:zoom(1.5) end end
Layer.Page24MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.4) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:settext('Blink is a bad mod.') usa_modtext2:zoom(1) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) usa_bg2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) end end
Layer.Page25MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.45) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb*.5) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('100% Reverse') usa_modtext1:zoomy(-1) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.35) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1.25) end end
Layer.Page26MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.7) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.25) P2:linear(spb) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.45) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.7) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) usa_modtext1:zoomy(1) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:hidden(0) usa_modtext2:settext('100% Beat') usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.25) usa_modtext2:linear(spb) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb) usa_bg2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-1) usa_bg2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.8) end end
Layer.Page31MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb*.5) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('100% Beat') usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.25) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.25) usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.65) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.6) end if usa_bg3 then usa_bg3:hidden(0) usa_bg3:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg3:x(0) usa_bg3:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) end end
Layer.Page32MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) end if P2 then P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) P2:linear(spb*.5) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:settext('100% Beat') usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) usa_modtext2:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) end if usa_bg2 then usa_bg2:hidden(1) end if usa_bg3 then usa_bg3:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg3:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.6) end end
Layer.Page33MessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) P1:linear(spb*.5) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) end if P2 then P2:linear(spb*.5) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:settext('100% Beat') usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT) usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) usa_modtext1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.6) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*-.5) usa_modtext2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.5) end if usa_bg3 then usa_bg3:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg3:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.3) usa_bg3:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.75) end end
Layer.LLOLMessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:zoom(1) P1:zoomx(1.5) P1:zoomy(.55) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) P1:bouncebegin(spb*4) P1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.25) P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.325) P1:zoomx(.5) P1:zoomy(.5) end if P2 then P2:zoom(1) P2:zoomx(1.5) P2:zoomy(.55) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.325) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.425) P2:bouncebegin(spb*4) P2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.75) P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.825) P2:zoomx(.5) P2:zoomy(.5) end if usa_modtext1 then usa_modtext1:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext1:zoom(0) usa_modtext1:diffusealpha(0) end if usa_modtext2 then usa_modtext2:linear(spb*.5) usa_modtext2:zoom(0) usa_modtext2:diffusealpha(0) end if usa_bg3 then usa_bg3:linear(spb*.5) usa_bg3:zoom(0) usa_bg3:rotationz(1800) usa_bg3:diffusealpha(0) end if usa_bgw then usa_bgw:bouncebegin(spb*4) usa_bgw:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*3) end if usa_bgp1 then usa_bgp1:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5); end if usa_bgp2 then usa_bgp2:zoomtoheight(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5); end if usa_sprite then usa_sprite:hidden(1) end if usa_line then usa_line:hidden(0) end SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():bouncebegin(spb*4) SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():x(0) end
Layer.CenterFlyMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bouncebegin(spb*4) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) end end end
Layer.ByeFlyMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:linear(spb*3) v:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*1.25) v:decelerate(spb) v:x(SCREEN_WIDTH * (.5+.25*((i*2)-3))) end end end
Layer.MergeFlyMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:linear(spb*16) v:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*.5) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) v:zoom(.75) v:GetChild('Judgment'):linear(spb*16) v:GetChild('Judgment'):x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*.5*((i*2)-3)) v:GetChild('Combo'):linear(spb*16) v:GetChild('Combo'):x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*.5*((i*2)-3)) end end end
Layer.FinFlyMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:linear(spb*16) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) v:zoom(1) end end end
Layer.bgaMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_bga1 then usa_bga1:queuecommand('Update') end if usa_bga2 then usa_bga2:queuecommand('Update') end if usa_bgb1 then usa_bgb1:hidden(1) end if usa_bgb2 then usa_bgb2:hidden(1) end end
Layer.bgbMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_bgb1 then usa_bgb1:queuecommand('Update') end if usa_bgb2 then usa_bgb2:queuecommand('Update') end if usa_bgp1 then usa_bgp1:hidden(1) end if usa_bgp2 then usa_bgp2:hidden(1) end end
Layer.bgcMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_bgc1 then usa_bgc1:queuecommand('Move') end if usa_bgc2 then usa_bgc2:queuecommand('Move') end if usa_bga1 then usa_bga1:linear(spb) usa_bga1:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*3) usa_bga1:queuecommand('Hide') end if usa_bga2 then usa_bga2:linear(spb) usa_bga2:x(SCREEN_WIDTH*3) usa_bga2:queuecommand('Hide') end end
Layer.HoleyMessageCommand: %function(self) if usa_hole then usa_hole:hidden(0) usa_hole:bounceend(spb) usa_hole:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH*.9) usa_hole:sleep(spb*4) usa_hole:bouncebegin(spb) usa_hole:zoomx(0) end end
Layer.UnholeyMessageCommand: %function(self) if P2 then P2:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.825) P2:rotationz(0) end end
Layer.UnpanMessageCommand: %function(self) if P1 then P1:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.325) P1:rotationz(0) end end
Layer.WaahMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(((i*2)-3)) v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(0) end end end
Layer.Waah2MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(((i*2)-3)*-2) v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(((i*2)-3)*2) v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(0) end end end
Layer.Waah3MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bounceend(spb) v:skewx(((i*2)-3)*-2) v:bounceend(spb) v:skewx(((i*2)-3)*2) v:decelerate(spb*.5) v:skewx(0) end end end
